title: Rick Ross' fiancee's mom slams girl who says he's unfaithful
content:
After Rick Ross proposed to his video vixen girlfriend,22 year old Lira Galore,her mother too to instagram to congratulate them.Then a follower said Rick Ross is still having sex with her friend and warned Lira to guard her heart.
Lira's momma was having none of that and shut her down saying they know he cheats but what matters is,her daughter got the ring while the lady's friend got a wet a*ss"..
She also replied fans who were shocked at her response ..more below
Lira's mom
